name: Arrested Development
author: Sarah Rennick

sections.description: A plugin based off Hello, Dolly that displays Arrested Development quotes at the top of your admin screen.
sections.installation:
1. Upload arrested-development to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Why did you decide to make this plugin?

I wanted to make a plugin and I thought it’d be a neat one.

How did you decide which quotes to use? Why didn’t you use ‘insert quote here’?

I picked the ones I did for recognizability, length and context. There were some I wanted to use that I didn’t because it was part of a conversation and it would have been too long.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial Release: Allows displaying of Arrested Development quotes in the admin area

1.1

  • Added that plugin is compatable with 4.1
  • and the ‘I’ve made a huge mistake’ quote, which I made a huge mistake about.. and forgot the first time around.

short_description: A plugin based off Hello, Dolly that displays Arrested Development quotes at the top of your admin screen.
